column4: Matboy:  yes Ubuntu is pretty good, but sadly not for all users
Matboy: in fact certain users would just be better off with Windows or  a Windows alternative such as ReactOS when it is more mature  http://www.reactos.org
it is for all users if its for me... i gues...
well excpet for certain KDE apps for example Konversation and K3B
in my experience of customziing Gnome it hasn't been quite as good as I wanted it to be,  but  better than KDE still
TeamColtra:  yep real IT technitan/pro in the making here, and I think a real one should have experience of  various operating systems, and not just Winblows
who told about ReactOS here :P :D, nice thing, just checked, really nice effort for easy migration
ahan, nice thing to share, thanks buddy, but i guess i am ubuntu + Virtual Box (with windows XP for games)
the channel for ReactOS is on freenode also by the way
ahan, i will check that out...
but reactOs would be for Windows/windows oriented users, for a person like me, i guess we wont migrate...
root no but could be useful to have in a VM or something rather than actsaul Windows when it is more mature
thats really nice, same is what i am doing, but a little broader level
leading a community promoting Open Source, and migrating people to Linux (that is ofcourse ubuntu)
